title: Serpentine Statuette in the Round of Lion
description: Lion rampant, supporting in his front paws a large alabastron; base oblong, with rounded end.  Body of the lion carved on both sides with designs that were originally inlaid.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.
